{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Sangonomiya Kokomi
|time               = 2023-02-22
|zh                 = 
;今天是珊瑚宫心海的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''派蒙：'''心海，你说，下一笔该画在哪里？
:'''珊瑚宫心海：'''嗯…等下旅行者醒过来会生气吧。
:'''派蒙：'''嘿嘿，旅行者才不会生我的气呢~
:'''派蒙：'''再说了，是旅行者不对，都说好了要去帮忙布置生日晚会，却还在这里睡懒觉。
:'''派蒙：'''喂&mdash;&mdash;！旅行者！旅行者&mdash;&mdash;
:'''珊瑚宫心海：'''没关系的。我们在这里多待一会儿，刚好可以把《沉秋拾剑录》读完。
:'''派蒙：'''心海喜欢《沉秋拾剑录》？
:'''珊瑚宫心海：'''嗯。派蒙也喜欢吗？
:'''派蒙：'''当然了，不过我们在璃月的经历可比《沉秋拾剑录》更刺激哦！
:'''珊瑚宫心海：'''这样啊，派蒙和旅行者真厉害。
:'''珊瑚宫心海：'''过来这边，可以和我说说那些故事吗？
:'''派蒙：'''好啊好啊，嘻嘻，我跟你说哦…
|dialogue_review_zh = 可以和我说说那些故事吗？
|en                 =
;Today is [[Sangonomiya Kokomi]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Paimon:''' Hey Kokomi, where should I draw next?
:'''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' Hmm... Won't the Traveler get mad when {{MC|he|she}} wakes up?
:'''Paimon:''' Hehe... The Traveler would never get mad at Paimon.
:'''Paimon:''' Either way, it's the Traveler fault for falling asleep even after promising to help with the birthday dinner decorations.
:'''Paimon:''' Hey&mdash;! Traveler! Traveler&mdash;
:'''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' Don't worry about it. We can stay here for a bit longer. This is the perfect opportunity for me to finish up [[A Legend of Sword]].
:'''Paimon:''' You like A Legend of Sword, Kokomi?
:'''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' Mm-hmm. Does Paimon like it too?
:'''Paimon:''' Of course, but our adventures in Liyue are so much more exciting than A Legend of Sword!
:'''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' Wow, Paimon and the Traveler are amazing.
:'''Sangonomiya Kokomi:''' Come over here. Could you tell me more about these stories?
:'''Paimon:''' Of course! Hehe, let me tell you...
|dialogue_review_en = Could you tell me more about these stories?
}}
